verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lamb is worthy (echo)
The Lamb is worthy (echo)
The Lamb who was slain (echo)
TOGETHER
He is worthy

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To receive power (echo)
And the riches (echo)
And the wisdom (echo)
And the strength
And the honor (echo)
And the glory (echo)
And the blessing (echo)
TOGETHER
The Lamb is worthy
The Lamb who was slain
